ygData.subject: Re: Feline
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She watched him work the console paying close attention to how he worked it.  Her eyes lit up as he said he would teach her how to work it. She smiled.

::Feline::

She watched him work the console paying close attention to how he 
worked it.  Her eyes lit up as he said he would teach her how to work 
it. She smiled. "Would you really? I'd like that."  She then looked 
at the console and then back at him."Don't I need clearence codes or 
something to operate the console? I don't want you to get into 
trouble." She pulled her tail up and touched the end of his nose with 
it.  She chuckled. "Your just so sweet to me. I don't know how I'll 
ever repay you." She giggled slightly,"but if you come up with an 
idea, let me know." She stood up and kisses him on the lips.  Then 
she sat back down in his chair.  

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Chordate:
> 
> 
> He smiled as Feline agreed to wait, and sat down in his chair.  He 
walked 
> over to her.  
> 
> "Well, basically, I let people in, I can work the base defenses.  I 
can send 
> long distance comm. transmissions.  I do quite a lot of stuff." he 
pressed a 
> few buttons, deactivating the sprinkler systems and flame retardent 
foam, 
> activating a few drainage systems in the floors of "Bright Blade's 
room" and 
> the hall near it.
> 
> "Maybe in a few days I'll show you how to use it."
